name: Katy Perry WITNESS: The Tour
desc: Katy Perry announcess she will be performing in South Africa for the very first time as part of her WITNESS: The Tour.

name: Daughtry
desc: As the frontman for the band bearing his name, Daughtry has become one of the most visible and consistent rock & roll torchbearers of the 21st Century.

name: Guns N Roses
desc: For the first time in the history of Guns N` Roses, the international rock icons will perform one show only in South Africa at the world renowned FNB Stadium in Johannesburg on 29th November 2018.
